summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3492 for the improvement of The Alleys in Blocks 51 and 52, S. A. Bell's 2nd Addition, being the Alleys between Boren and Minor Avenues, extending from Howell Street to Virginia Street; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 43265, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
